# Lambda0

```{r}
# Set random seed
set.seed(1)

# Generate some y_{in}
J = 32
y = rnorm(J, mean=1, sd=.5)
y[1] = -3
print(y)

# Plot y_{in}
{
  par(mfrow=c(1,2))
  plot(y)
  hist(y)
  par(mfrow=c(1,1))
}

# Likelihood
d1 <- dnorm(y, mean=1, sd=1)

# Noisy likelihood
d2 <- dnorm(y, mean=0, sd=3)

# Cauchy likelihood
d3 <- dt(y, df=1)

# d4 <- dnorm(y, mean=1, sd=3)

print(prod(d1))
print(prod(d2))
print(prod(d3))
# print(prod(d4))
```
